entry.message:
[DQC.US.0144.9866] The filing reports a value for the extension concept IPW:SellingAndFulfillment in the statement 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations (Unaudited). This monetary concept appears in the statement but does not have a balance type defined. All monetary items defined in 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations (Unaudited) should have a balance type of debit or credit.
Concept : IPW:SellingAndFulfillment Period :2019-07-01 to 2020-06-30 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9866 Rule version: 19.0.0RC2 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1830072/000168316821004546/ipower_i10k-063021.htm 6758
